description: This Lancashire based village is located near Croston and Parbold. Local walking highlights include the lovely grounds of the ancient Rufford Old Hall and easy walks along the towpath of the Leeds and Liverpool Canal. This walk takes you to the old hall and the canal from the village. You can follow public footpaths west along the New Reed Brook to the site. Here you will find a National Trust owned black and white house dating to 1530. There's also lovely bluebell woods, pretty gardens and pleasant canalside trails to enjoy here.
